00032 #include "xid_device_scanner_t.h"
00033 #include "xid_con_t.h"
00034 
00035 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00036 
00037 cedrus::xid_device_scanner_t::xid_device_scanner_t(void)
00038 {
00039     load_available_com_ports();
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 cedrus::xid_device_scanner_t::~xid_device_scanner_t(void)
00044 {
00045 }
00046 
00047 void cedrus::xid_device_scanner_t::load_available_com_ports()
00048 {
00049     available_com_ports_.clear();
00050     for(int i=1; i < MAX_PORTS; ++i)
00051     {
00052         wchar_t port_name[10];
00053         wsprintf(port_name, L"COM%d", i);
00054 
00055         cedrus::xid_con_t conn(port_name);
00056 
00057         int status = conn.open();
00058         
00059         if(status == NO_ERR)
00060         {
00061             conn.close();
00062             available_com_ports_.push_back(port_name);
00063         }
00064     }
00065 }
00066 
00067 int cedrus::xid_device_scanner_t::detect_valid_xid_devices()
00068 {
00069     load_available_com_ports();
00070 
00071     xid_connections_.clear();
00072     int devices = 0;
00073 
00074     for(std::vector<std::wstring>::iterator iter = available_com_ports_.begin(),
00075                                               end = available_com_ports_.end();
00076         iter != end; ++iter)
00077     {
00078         bool device_found = false;
00079         const int baud_rate[] = { 115200, 19200, 9600, 57600, 38400 };
00080         const int num_bauds   = sizeof(baud_rate)/sizeof(int);
00081         
00082         for(int i = 0; i < num_bauds && !device_found; ++i)
00083         {
00084             boost::shared_ptr<cedrus::xid_con_t> xid_con(
00085                 new xid_con_t(*iter, baud_rate[i]));
00086 
00087             if(xid_con->open() == NO_ERR)
00088             {
00089                 char return_info[200];
00090                 xid_con->send_xid_command(
00091                     "_c1",
00092                     0,
00093                     return_info,
00094                     sizeof(return_info),
00095                     5,
00096                     1000,
00097                     100);
00098 
00099                 if(strstr(return_info, "_xid"))
00100                 {
00101                     // found an XID device
00102                     ++devices;
00103                     xid_connections_.push_back(xid_con);
00104                     device_found = true;
00105 
00106                     if(strcmp(return_info, "_xid0") != 0)
00107                     {
00108                         // device is not in XID mode.  Currently this library
00109                         // only supports XID mode so we issue command 'c10' to
00110                         // set the device into XID mode
00111                         char empty_return[10];
00112                         xid_con->send_xid_command(
00113                             "c10",
00114                             0,
00115                             empty_return,
00116                             sizeof(empty_return),
00117                             0);
00118 
00119                         xid_con->flush_input();
00120                         xid_con->flush_output();
00121                     }
00122                 }
00123             }
00124             
00125             xid_con->close();
00126         }
00127     }
00128 
00129     return devices;
00130 }
00131 
00132 boost::shared_ptr<cedrus::xid_con_t> cedrus::xid_device_scanner_t::connection_at_index(unsigned int i)
00133 {
00134     if(i >= xid_connections_.size())
00135         return boost::shared_ptr<xid_con_t>();
00136 
00137     return xid_connections_[i];
00138 }
